body:
(From API review)

We'd like to avoid this change as it makes the variable scope harder to reason about (harder than it is now :). We don't have a way to set `self._reuse = False` either.

If you have a strong use case for this, we'd love to hear it. Otherwise, we're tempted to drop this change.

Thanks.
